Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3all2on_AA7Pr.name: all(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3all2on_AA7Pr.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolved when all passed in Promises resolve. Rejects as soon as one promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3all2on_AA7Pr.name: all(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3all2on_AA7Pr.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolved when all passed in Promises resolve. Rejects as soon as one promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3any2on_AA7Pr.name: any(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3any2on_AA7Pr.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolves as soon as one passed in Promise resolves

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3any2on_AA7Pr.name: any(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3any2on_AA7Pr.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolves as soon as one passed in Promise resolves

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird5delay2on__AA.name: delay(on:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird5delay2on__AA.abstract: Delay the start of a Promise chain by some number of seconds

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird5delay2on__AA.name: delay(on:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird5delay2on__AA.abstract: Delay the start of a Promise chain by some number of seconds

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on__AA7.name: join(on:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on__AA7.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolves to a tuple of the passed in Promises. Rejects as soon as one Promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on___AA.name: join(on:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on___AA.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolves to a tuple of the passed in Promises. Rejects as soon as one Promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on____A.name: join(on:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4join2on____A.abstract: Returns a Promise that resolves to a tuple of the passed in Promises. Rejects as soon as one Promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3map2on__AA7P.name: map(on:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird3map2on__AA7P.abstract: Map an array of items to Promises, and resolve when all Promises resolve. Rejects as soon as any Promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird9mapSeries2on.name: mapSeries(on:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird9mapSeries2on.abstract: Map an array of items to Promises, and resolve each Promise in series. Rejects as soon as any Promise rejects.

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4race2on_AA7P.name: race(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4race2on_AA7P.abstract: Identical to all, but does not throw an error for an empty array of Promises

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4race2on_AA7P.name: race(on:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird4race2on_AA7P.abstract: Identical to all, but does not throw an error for an empty array of Promises

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird6reduce2on___.name: reduce(on:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird6reduce2on___.abstract: Reduce a sequence of items with a asynchronous operation (Promise) to a single value

Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird11VoidPromise.name: VoidPromise()
Functions.html#/s:8Bluebird11VoidPromise.abstract: Convenient function for creating a resolved Void Promise

Enums/ReflectionState.html.name: ReflectionState
Enums/ReflectionState.html.abstract: Enum used to describe the result of a promise

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: isPending
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Is this Promise in a pending state

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: isCanceled
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Is this Promise in a canceled state

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: result
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: The resolved result of the promise

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: error
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: The rejected error of the promise

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: init(resolve:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Initialize to a resolved result

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: init(reject:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Initializa to a rejected error

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: init(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Initialize using a resolver function

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: init(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Initialize using a resolver function and onCancel block

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: init(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Convenience initializer to resolve this Promise when a returned Promise is resolved

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: cancel()
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Cancels the promise synchronously

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: catch(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Catches an error in a Promise chain and allows the chain to recover

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: Resolver
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Wrap a Promise and its resolve / reject handlers in a tuple

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: defer()
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Useful for resolving a Promise outside of the default constructors

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: delay(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Delay the next handler of the Promise chain by some number of seconds

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: finally(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Always run a handler at the end of a promise chain regardless of the whether the chain resolves or rejects

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: map(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Identical to map(), but can be chained on an existing promise that resolves to a sequence type

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: mapSeries(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Identical to map(series), but can be chained on an existing promise that resolves to a sequence type

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: recover(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Catch a Promise rejection and recover from it if possible

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: recover(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Catch a Promise rejection and recover from it if possible

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: reduce(on:_:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Identical to reduce(), but can be chained on an existing promise that resolves to a sequence type

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: reflect(on:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Returns a Promise that will always resolve to the final state of the receiver

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: return(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Convenience method for .then { _ in value }

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: thenReturn(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Convenience method for .then { _ in value }

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: tap(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Perform an operation in the middle of a promise chain that does not effect the resolved value, but can reject the chain

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: tap(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Perform an operation in the middle of a promise chain that does not effect the resolved value

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: tapCatch(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: React to an error in a promise chain without recovering the chain from that error, useful for error logging

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: tapCatch(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: React to an error in a promise chain without recovering the chain from that error, useful for error logging

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: then(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Perform an operation on a Promise once it resolves. The chain will then resolve to the Promise returned from the handler

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: then(on:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Perform an operation on a Promise once it resolves. The chain will then resolve to the Promise returned from the handler

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: timeout(on:_:_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Reject the receiving Promise if it does not resolve / reject after a given number of seconds

Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.name: asVoid
Classes/Promise.html#/s:8Bluebird7Promis.abstract: Converts the current Promise to a generic Void Promise
